verses.verse: <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3381>Go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> you, and your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and your <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H935>enter<s%> in by <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H6213>Execute<s%> you <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6216>oppressor:<s%> and do <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3238>wrong,<s%> do <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H2554>violence<s%> to the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> nor the <S%H490>widow,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> indeed, then shall there <S%H935>enter<s%> in by the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> he, and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> I <S%H7650>swear<s%> by myself, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2723>desolation.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> You are <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> to me, and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon:<s%> yet <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> I will <S%H7896>make<s%> you a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are not <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

And I will <S%H6942>prepare<s%> <S%H7843>destroyers<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H3627>weapons:<s%> and they shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> down your <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H730>cedars,<s%> and cast them <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%>

Then they shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> them.

<S%H1058>Weep<s%> you not for the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> him: but <S%H1058>weep<s%> sore for him that <S%H1980>goes<s%> away: for he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> nor <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H4138>native<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>touching<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> He shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> any <S%H5750>more:<s%>

But he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have led him <S%H1540>captive,<s%> and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H1129>builds<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> by <S%H3808>unrighteousness,<s%> <S%H6664><s%> and his <S%H5944>chambers<s%> by <S%H3808>wrong;<s%> <S%H4941><s%> that uses his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H5647>service<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>wages,<s%> and <S%H5414>gives<s%> him not for his <S%H6467>work;<s%>

That <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H4060>wide<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H7304>large<s%> <S%H5944>chambers,<s%> and <S%H7167>cuts<s%> him out <S%H2474>windows;<s%> and it is <S%H5603>paneled<s%> with <S%H730>cedar,<s%> and <S%H4886>painted<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion.<s%>

Shall you <S%H4427>reign,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H8474>close<s%> yourself in <S%H730>cedar?<s%> did not your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice,<s%> and <S%H227>then<s%> it was <S%H2896>well<s%> with him?

He <S%H1777>judged<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy;<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> it was <S%H2896>well<s%> with him: was not <S%H1931>this<s%> to <S%H1847>know<s%> me? <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and your <S%H3820>heart<s%> are not but for your <S%H1215>covetousness,<s%> and for to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and for <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> and for <S%H4835>violence,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> They shall not <S%H5594>lament<s%> for him, saying, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> my <S%H251>brother!<s%> or, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> <S%H269>sister!<s%> they shall not <S%H5594>lament<s%> for him, saying, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> <S%H113>lord!<s%> or, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> his <S%H1935>glory!<s%>

He shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> with the <S%H6900>burial<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> <S%H5498>drawn<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> forth <S%H1973>beyond<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H5927>Go<s%> up to <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and <S%H6817>cry;<s%> and <S%H5414>lift<s%> up your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H6817>cry<s%> from the <S%H5676>passages:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>lovers<s%> are <S%H7665>destroyed.<s%>

I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you in your <S%H7962>prosperity;<s%> but you <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H8085>hear.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> has been your <S%H1870>manner<s%> from your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> that you <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall <S%H7462>eat<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7462>pastors,<s%> and your <S%H157>lovers<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity:<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> shall you be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%>

O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> that make your <S%H7077>nest<s%> in the <S%H730>cedars,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H2603>gracious<s%> shall you be when <S%H2256>pangs<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on you, the <S%H2427>pain<s%> as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail!<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were the <S%H2368>signet<s%> on my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3588>yet<s%> would I <S%H5423>pluck<s%> you <S%H8033>there;<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H5315>life,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them whose <S%H6440>face<s%> you <S%H1481>fear,<s%> even into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

And I will <S%H2904>cast<s%> you out, and your <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>bore<s%> you, <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you were not <S%H3205>born;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall you <S%H4191>die.<s%>
But to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whereunto<s%> they <S%H5375>desire<s%> <S%H5315><s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> shall they not <S%H7725>return.<s%>

Is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> a <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H5310>broken<s%> <S%H6089>idol?<s%> is he a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> are they <S%H7993>cast<s%> out, he and his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and are <S%H2904>cast<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3045>know<s%> not?
O <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6185>childless,<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> that shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3117>days:<s%> for <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H4910>ruling<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
